eventsDataJson.description: If you wish to learn from the best and create something uber cool this season, Ingenium brings you the perfect opportunity! The Kickstart IoT workshop will introduce you to the world of Arduino microcontroller and will provide an opportunity to create an IoT device or system. The participants would be taught about Arduino and be given a hands-on implementation with various modules that work with it. Furthermore, the workshop will cover the connection with IBM Cloud by industry experts. No chance like now to learn this!
